com.thomsonreuters.upa.examples.newsviewer

Class NewsHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.thomsonreuters.upa.examples.newsviewer.NewsHandler

  • public class NewsHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the news handler for the UPA NewsViewer application. It provides methods for sending the market price request(s) to a provider and processing the response(s). News items are requested via these market price requests. Methods for decoding a field entry from a response, and closing market price streams are also provided.

      • sendItemRequests

        public int sendItemRequests(ChannelSession chnl,
                            java.util.List<java.lang.String> itemNames,
                            boolean isPrivateStream,
                            com.thomsonreuters.upa.valueadd.domainrep.rdm.login.LoginRefresh loginInfo,
                            com.thomsonreuters.upa.valueadd.domainrep.rdm.directory.Service serviceInfo,
                            com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport.Error error)
        Encodes and sends item requests for news items
        Parameters:
        chnl - - The channel to send a source directory request to
        itemNames - - List of item names
        isPrivateStream - - flag indicating if requested items are private stream or not.
        loginInfo - - RDM login information
        serviceInfo - - RDM directory response information
        Returns:
        success if item requests can be made, can be encoded and sent successfully. Failure if service does not support market price capability or failure for encoding/sending request.

      • processResponse

        public int processResponse(ChannelSession chnl,
                           com.thomsonreuters.upa.codec.Msg msg,
                           com.thomsonreuters.upa.codec.DecodeIterator dIter,
                           com.thomsonreuters.upa.codec.DataDictionary dictionary,
                           com.thomsonreuters.upa.transport.Error error)
        Publicly visible response handler Processes a market price response containing news info. This consists of extracting the key, printing out the item name contained in the key, decoding the field list and field entry, and calling decodeFieldEntry() to decode the field entry data.
        Parameters:
        msg - - The partially decoded message
        dIter - - The decode iterator
        Returns:
        success if decoding succeeds, failure if it fails.
